name: Radiant Alakazam
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

abilities.name: Painful Spoons
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may move up to 2 damage counters from 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon to another of their Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Ruler
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each card in your opponent’s hand.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Radiant Pokémon in your deck.
